subject: Contending Tides Tips (I): Become Your Strongest Self
content:
A no-holds-barred fighting tournament is underway at the Meaty Arena in Dadaupa Gorge, with rewards on offer for successful challengers.


Starting April 2, 2021 at 10:00 (server time), a new challenge will unlock each day. Travelers who reach Adventure Rank 20, break the three seals at the Sword Cemetery, and complete the quest "Mountainous Summons" will be eligible to take part.


Itching to get in the arena? Start by checking out the Arena Effects for the first three days of the tournament, outlined for you below. Knowing the buffs and how to get the most out of them will be a great asset to you once the fight begins!

subject: Genshin Impact OST Album - Vortex of Legends
content:
Genshin Impact's Dragonspine-themed album "Vortex of Legends" is out now! Featuring 17 spectacular tracks from composer Yu-Peng Chen @HOYO-MiX, each one an original composition for the Dragonspine area.




Click here to listen to "Vortex of Legends"


iTunes/Apple Music


Spotify

subject: A new challenge is coming... The countdown to the "A Thousand Questions With Paimon" Quiz Event beta has begun!
content:
Paimon has prepared a new challenge for you~

The "A Thousand Questions With Paimon" Quiz Event beta will be opening on April 6!


〓Event Duration〓 

Begins 2021/04/06 13:00! (UTC+8)


〓Eligibility〓 

Adventure Rank 10 or above


〓How to Access Event〓 

Go to HoYoLAB


We look forward to seeing you there~

subject: Event Wish "Farewell of Snezhnaya" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Childe" Tartaglia (Hydro)!
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

  

〓Event Wish Details〓

​


● During this event, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo), "Shining Idol" Barbara (Hydro), and "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl (Electro) will get a huge drop-rate boost!● During this wish event, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Childe" Tartaglia (Hydro) will get a huge drop-rate boost! 

● After this wish event ends, the 4-star character "Thorny Benevolence" Rosaria (Cryo) will be added to the Standard Wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in Version 1.5.

※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be added to the Standard Wish.


※ The "Test Run" character trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Complete the challenges to receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: Version 1.4 "Invitation of Windblume" New Weapon Overview - Part 2
content: Hey there, Travelers~! Today, Paimon wants to show you a brand new weapon that'll be in "Epitome Invocation" — Alley Hunter (Bow)! Let's go take a look~

subject: "Invitation of Windblume" Version 1.4 Event Updates - Round 2
content:
Heya Travelers~!


The Windblume Festival really helped Paimon better understand Mondstadt and its people. Travelers, do you feel the same as Paimon?


The Windblume Festival is almost over, but there are more events coming up:

subject: Contending Tides Tips (II): A Champion's Road
content: Hey there, Travelers~ The tournament at the Meaty Arena is in full swing. This time, we'll be going through some tips for the second half of the Contending Tides event!

subject: Genshin Impact EP - A Warrior Far From Home
content:
Traveling through the tranquil wilderness, tarrying a while in the bustling city,


Even the wayfaring heart of the warrior, which delights in conflict, struggle, and adventure,


Will sometimes be bound by thoughts of his snowy homeland.

subject: "Floral Breeze" - Scenes from Windblume Festival | Genshin Impact
content:
The winds in cloud and rain abide,


Through a flowery sea of dreams they go.


You by my side and in my heart reside,


Where waves of love shall forever flow.

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Rosaria: Purger of the Shadows" | Genshin Impact
content:
The City of Freedom is old in years but young at heart, innocent in spirit despite a history mired in complexity.


While the pure sleep in safety, a sinner spills blood in the night, taking the act of redemption into her own hands.

subject: Genshin Impact 4-Panel Comics | Part 16: Be Our Honorary Knight
content: "Traveler, please be our Honorary Knight!"

subject: "Wishful Drops" Event - Explore Areas and Obtain the Gadget "Endora"!
content:
During this event, Travelers can equip Inquisitive Endora to capture Oceanid Creatures in designated areas and increase area exploration progress. Complete quests to earn the commemorative event gadget Endora, Hearts of the Spring, Primogems, and other rewards. After successfully completing a challenge in "Rhodeia's Rage," you can use a Heart of the Spring or Original Resin to get Character EXP Material and other rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

2021/04/09 10:00:00 –2021/04/16 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

〓Event Details〓

●During this event, complete the quest "Life Flows On (I)" to obtain the event gadget Inquisitive Endora. Equip it to explore designated areas and use special skills to capture Oceanid Creatures and increase your exploration progress. Completing an exploration will reward you with a Heart of the Spring.

subject: "Wishful Drops" Gameplay Details
content:
With no warning, the water sources on the border between Mondstadt and Liyue have turned bitter. Could this spell the end of Mondstadt's wine industry?


During this event, Travelers can equip Inquisitive Endora to capture Oceanid Creatures in designated areas. Increase area exploration progress and complete quests to earn rewards including the commemorative Gadget "Endora," Hearts of the Spring, and Primogems. After completing the event challenge "Rhodeia's Rage," Travelers can use either a Heart of the Spring or Original Resin to obtain Character EXP Materials and other rewards.


〓Event Rewards〓

​


〓Event Duration〓

2021/04/09 10:00 – 2021/04/16 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Gameplay Details〓

Endora's Education

After completing the prerequisite quest "Life Flows On (I)," you will obtain the event-limited Gadget "Inquisitive Endora." Over time, exploration areas will gradually unlock.

After equipping Inquisitive Endora, you can summon her in exploration areas. If you are not in an exploration area, she will not answer your summons.

1. Equip Inquisitive Endora

2. Summon Inquisitive Endora in an exploration area


​


After equipping Endora, your Elemental Skill will be replaced with Endora's Bubble Spit ability. Travelers can switch between skills as needed.


​


Use Bubble Spit to capture certain enemies. Hold to adjust the distance.


​


Using Cryo can make capturing enemies easier. When a bubble traps an Oceanid Creature, Endora can absorb them, increasing the area's exploration progress. Explore the area fully to obtain rewards for that area.

Note: Defeating Oceanid Creatures rather than capturing them will not increase exploration progress~


​



​



Complete exploration in an area to receive a "Heart of the Spring."



Rhodeia's Rage

​


During this event, the event challenge "Rhodeia's Rage" will be added to the Oceanid's arena. Travelers may select which challenge to undertake. After the event challenge begins, the game will enter a special challenge mode in which pausing and teleporting will be disabled.

Certain characters will receive increased Hydro RES and Energy Recharge during the event challenge.

Rhodeia will demonstrate new attacks during the challenge.


​


During combat, Fitful Rapids will appear in the arena. Using these strategically will allow you to avoid attacks.


​



After completing the event challenge, use either a Heart of the Spring or Original Resin to obtain Character EXP Materials and other rewards.

Alright, Paimon's done explaining for now~ Paimon will have more info to bring in the future, so see ya next time~!

subject: Genshin Impact Manga
content:
A new Fatui recruit has arrived in Liyue for a special assignment at the request of the 11th Harbinger,

Childe — who seems somewhat different from the mighty Harbinger that the recruit originally had in mind...

subject: New Archon Quest "Chapter I: Act IV - We Will Be Reunited" Coming Soon
content:
You hear from Ganyu and Lan that the Treasure Hoarders of Mondstadt and Liyue have banded together and plan to get involved in some ruins associated with the Abyss Order. Fearing the chaos that the Treasure Hoarders might cause through their involvement, you take up the commission and investigate...


After reaching the required Adventure Rank and completing the prerequisite quests, Travelers will find "Chapter I: Act IV - We Will Be Reunited" under Archon Quests in the Quest Menu.


(Once the quest system has been unlocked, Travelers may open the Quest Menu by pressing J (PC), tapping the quest icon in the top-left corner (mobile), or holding the L1 button and selecting the quest icon from the Shortcut Wheel (PS4).)



〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after 2021/04/12 04:00



〓Quest Unlock Criteria〓

Reach Adventure Rank 36 or above

Complete the Story Quest "Lupus Minor Chapter: Act I - The Meaning of Lupical"

Complete the World Quest "Chapter I: Act IV (Prelude) - Bough Keeper: Dainsleif"


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Marvelous Merchandise Event: Open Boxes o' Marvels and Get Primogems!
content:
During the event, Travelers can look around Mondstadt for Liben the merchant. Give him the materials he requires to open Boxes o' Marvels, which contain Primogems and other rewards.


After exchanging for Boxes o' Marvels five times, a Mega Box O' Marvels will be unlocked, which provides Travelers with additional rewards that include Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.


 

〓Event Duration〓

2021-04-16 10:00:00 - 2021-04-23 03:59:59


 

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 12 or above


 

〓Event Details〓

● Liben will randomly provide Travelers with seven different types of Box o' Marvels rewards. Travelers can preview the contents of each Box o' Marvels before opening them. Rewards may also differ for each player according to their game progress. Travelers can enter other players' worlds to exchange for their desired Box o' Marvels rewards.

※ Travelers can submit materials to Liben only once per day. Please mind the daily refresh time of the rewards, as any unused chances to open Boxes o' Marvels will be lost.

subject: 1.5 Special Program Announcement
content:
Dear Travelers,


Today Paimon brings you great news! The Special Program for "Genshin Impact" version 1.5 will be officially released on April 16 at 11:00 AM (UTC-5)!


During the special program, you will discover all the juicy details of version 1.5. In addition to that, you can get redemption codes and other incredible gifts that we prepared especially for you. Do not miss out!


The Special Program will be hosted on our official YouTube channel >>> https://www.youtube.com/c/GenshinImpact


Paimon will see you all there!

subject: Version 1.5 "Beneath the Light of Jadeite" Trailer | Genshin Impact
content:
Moonlight falls on the branches as a dragon's roar rises from deep beneath the roots. A drop of sun may trickle in, but a heart of stone is not easily moved.


Deals are sealed with scarlet flames and ice-cold vengeance floods forth in waves. But far from the fight is a realm of serenity, where a gentle melody forever plays.

subject: Developers Discussion – 4/16
content:
Mail-marking function is here!

Hello everyone! Paimon is here with our newest Developers Discussion. Let's see what updates we have, shall we! (*^∇^*)


Q1: Can't you lower the Original Resin Requirement of the weekly challenges? After doing one on Monday, I don't have enough resin to do anything else for the rest of the week.

 

A1: Paimon is on it! The Original Resin consumption of weekly challenges like Trounce Domain and Lupus Boreas, Dominator of Wolves will be adjusted in Version 1.5. For more details, make sure to check out our upcoming version 1.5 Special Program.




Q2: It's really hard to aim on mobile devices. Especially with the touch screen, it took me forever to get it right! Trying to complete the eagle shooting achievement is such a torture.

 

 A2: In version 1.5, we have improved the aiming experience on mobile devices with the following solutions:

 

 - On mobile devices, three additional adjustment levels have been added under Settings > Camera Sensitivity (Aimed Shot Mode). It has been increased from the original levels 1 to 5 (which now correspond with the new levels 4 to 8) to the new adjustment levels 1 to 8.

 

 - On mobile devices, under Settings, there is now a Camera Acceleration Mode (Aimed Shot Mode). With this mode selected, the camera movement speed will change dynamically with the speed of your finger.

 

 - Also, to adapt to different screen sizes of mobile devices, there will be a new option under Settings, UI Border Offset. Travelers can adjust the positioning of the whole UI interface on the screen of your device.

 

We welcome your feedback and suggestions! Paimon will make sure to write them all down!




Q3: Can you display the number of items in possession on the Crafting Page? I hate to have to open my Inventory over and over to check how many of each item I have.

 

A3: The dev team has received your feedback! In version 1.5, Travelers will be able to see the numbers of items in possession on the Crafting, Forging, and Cooking menus.




Q4: Since the beginning, I have saved up more than 200 mails that I think are worth collecting, but one day I accidentally deleted all of them! We need a mail-lock function ASAP!

 

A4: Aw, Paimon wants to give you a big hug! In Version 1.5, we have added a new mail marking function. Mails that are marked will not be deleted by the Delete All function (although expired mail will still disappear). Also, the mail saving function is also under development!




Q5: Why is it that the characters' combat voice lines are not listed under Profile > Voice-Over? I can't make out what they're saying when they're performing Skills.

 

A5: Hmm, interesting question, wait a second... Oh, Paimon's got it! In later versions, under each character's Profile > Voice-Over, there will be an additional page displaying the character's combat voice lines.




Q6: It's too easy to delete Friends by accident! I just wanted to click on their Avatar to invite them to join my world, but my hand slipped and deleted them instead!

 

A6: Our developers have received this feedback. In later versions, a confirmation message will pop up when deleting friends.




Q7: There should be some sort of account verification when logging in. Don't allow people to log in by just knowing a username and password alone.

 

A7: Paimon has forwarded on this feedback to the dev team! According to our experts, they are in the process of developing a solution that will further ensure account security for our users. Once the solution is ready, it will first be tested on some regions, if no further issues arise, then it will eventually be implemented to all servers.




Q8: Sometimes when I want to replenish my HP by visiting a Statue of The Seven, it only replenishes a small amount of HP, and it shows that it has 0/50000 HP replenishment point. No one has come to my world, and I haven't used it either, it just went to zero for no reason.

 

A8: The dev team is working on this problem. There may have been an issue with the way the Statue of The Seven's regeneration rate is recorded in the server. (Going offline or disconnecting from a Co-op play may cause the Statue's regeneration rate to not function properly.)


 

Now, the Statue of The Seven's regeneration rate has been fixed accordingly. So that going offline, or disconnecting from a Co-op play will no longer cause this bug to occur.

subject: Developers Discussion - 4/17 | All you need to know about the Serenitea Pot system!
content:
Greetings, Travelers! After the release of our Special Program for version 1.5, we've received many feedbacks and questions from Travelers about the Serenitea Pot system. About these frequently asked questions, Paimon has interviewed the dev team, and Paimon will answer all of your questions here~


According to Paimon's understanding, many aspects of gameplay with the Serenitea Pot are still under development at this stage. Some of these aspects are mentioned in this discussion, and they will be made available to all Travelers in the later versions of the game. Paimon will give a more detailed introduction to the Serenitea Pot system later on. Now, let's check out Paimon's discussion with the developers today!


Q1: How can I obtain Materials or Furnishings?

A1: Paimon has done the homework! Travelers can obtain Materials for making Furnishings by cutting down trees, collecting ore or items in Teyvat. For example, you can obtain wood for making Furnishings by cutting down trees.

Also, you can obtain Furnishings or Furnishing Materials by increasing Teapot Spirit Trust Rank, or redeem them at the Realm Depot or Teapot Traveling Salesman.


Q2: Can I grow vegetables or flowers in Serenitea Pot?

A2: When the developers first started designing the Serenitea Pot, they had already planned to have a gardening system, and who doesn't love gardening! (〃'▽'〃)

Although, the gardening system is proved to be more complex, so let's give the dev team some more time to polish it. The gardening system is not yet available in Version 1.5, but after a proper amount of development time and testing, it very soon will be online for all Travelers!


Q3: When gardening is available, what can I get from growing plants in Serenitea Pot? Can I get Mora, Resin, or Primogem?

A3: Well... you reap what you sow. And Paimon doesn't think Mora grows on trees...

At the Realm Treasures, travelers can exchange for things like Mora or Hero's Wit. Paimon has seen some new things like Sanctifying Essence and Sanctifying Unction, which can be used to upgrade artifacts... In addition, you can also get a new kind of resin through Realm Treasures. This new Resin has the same functionality as the existing Resin, only that it will decompose with time. So Travelers, don't forget to use them in time.


Q4: Can characters that I own be stationed in my Abode?

A4: Paimon knows the answer to this question! Paimon has seen it on the developers' notes! In Version 1.6, the characters owned by Travelers can also be stationed in Serenitea Pot! Paimon wants a room too...


Q5: Can I interact with the Furnishings in Serenitea Pot? Can I recover HP in Serenitea Pot?

A5: Well... Paimon has seen a lot of exquisite Furnishings in Serenitea Pot, but Paimon doesn't think Paimon can interact with any of them. The dev team is still working on Furnishings interactions.

Let's leave the HP recovery to the Statue of The Seven!


Q6: Can I custom-make my own furnishings?

A6: In the current version, there are already over 200 furnishings that you can place. In future versions, types and styles of furnishings will continue to be added. Paimon will pass on your request for custom furnishings to the dev Team!


Q7: Can I send furnishings as gifts to my friends?

A7: Paimon will let the dev team know about your request for gifting as well. Although at present, you can't send furnishing as gifts, Travelers can visit their friends' Realms or you can invite your friends to visit yours!


During the weekends, Teapot Traveling Salesman will bring unique furnishings to every Traveler. Go visit your friends' Realm, maybe you can exchange for some new furnishings!


The Serenitea Pot system you'll experience in Version 1.5 is just the beginning. Many functions and contents are not yet available. We understand that there's still a gap between the current version and your expectation in terms of building, placing, and interaction. We're working on them. The dev team is further optimizing the guidance and user-friendliness of the system. Meanwhile, we're also developing more gameplays such as gardening.


The Serenitea Pot is a brand new system, separated from the world exploration, combats, or stages. We hope to bring Travelers a more free and leisurely way of gameplay, and to provide you with a unique space during your journey in Teyvat, which completely belongs to you alone.


After the Version 1.5 update, please give us your feedback and suggestions. These will be very important to push us to optimize the system. Only with the help of all our Travelers, can the Serenitea Pot system and its subsequent gameplays be moved towards perfection. We hope that Serenitea Pot will bring you more enjoyment to our game in the future.

subject: Character Shorts - Xiao
content:
"Almond Tofu and Grilled Tiger Fish... Do you think Xiao will like our surprise?"


"Shh, not so loud, Paimon! Also, you're drooling onto the table!"

subject: Version 1.5 "Beneath the Light of Jadeite": New System
content:
Travelers are all surely curious about the new Serenitea Pot system in the new version update. Well then, we shall introduce everyone to this brand-new system today!


Adepti use Serenitea Pots as media through which they can channel their adeptal power and create realms and abodes. These miraculous teapots seemingly contain another realm within.


As the owner of this realm, you may decorate it however you wish and turn it into a home away from home.


▌ Serenitea Pot

◆ Serenitea Pot Unlock Criteria

Complete the quest "A Teapot to Call Home" to obtain the gadget "Serenitea Pot."

"A Teapot to Call Home" Quest Unlock Criteria:

● Adventure Rank 35 or above

● Complete the Archon Quest, Chapter I: Act III "A New Star Approaches"


Entering the Serenitea Pot

Travelers can go to Inventory > Gadgets to use and summon the Serenitea Pot. Interact with it to enter the realm within.


Leaving the Serenitea Pot

When inside the realm, use and summon the Serenitea Pot again and interact with it to leave the Serenitea Pot.

​


Travelers can also open the Map, switch to the Teyvat world map from the bottom-right corner, and use a Teleport Waypoint or Statue of The Seven to leave the Serenitea Pot.


▌ Realm

When Travelers first enter the Serenitea Pot, you can choose from three realm layouts. Select the realm layout you prefer, then craft and place furnishings in your realm. Construct your realm however you please.

​

As you craft furnishings and your Trust Rank with the tea spirit increases, you will unlock other realm areas as well as the two other realm layouts.

After unlocking new realm layouts, Travelers can switch between them and decorate them. Don't worry, I will explain in detail how to craft furnishings.


▌ Furnishings

In your realm, you can place buildings, geological features, furniture, decorations, plants, animals, and more. You can design indoor and outdoor areas to your liking.

​


◆ How to Obtain Furnishing Blueprints

You can obtain Furnishing Blueprints by increasing your Trust Rank, completing the Adeptal Mirror, and participating in events. Besides this, you can exchange for Furnishing Blueprints in the Realm Depot or from the Teapot Traveling Salesman.

​

​


◆ How to Craft Furnishings

After obtaining and learning Furnishing Blueprints, you can interact with the teapot spirit to craft furnishings. You can cut down trees, collect ore and plants, and craft fabric and dye at the teapot spirit's location to obtain more materials for crafting furnishings.

​


◆ Trust Rank

The first time you craft and obtain a furnishing, you will earn Trust. Accumulate Trust to increase your Trust Rank. As you increase your Trust Rank, you will unlock more new features for the Serenitea Pot and earn various rewards.

​


◆ How to Place Furnishings

After crafting a furnishing, you can click on the furnishings icon in the top-right corner to enter the Furnishings Screen. On the Furnishings Screen, you can place the furnishings you have crafted.

​


▌ Teapot Spirit

In the Serenitea Pot, you can talk to the teapot spirit to learn more about the Serenitea Pot and use features in the realm.

​


◆ Realm Currency

In realms, you will collect a kind of currency called Realm Currency. You can use Realm Currency to exchange for different items from the teapot spirit.

Talk to the teapot spirit and open the Jar of Riches. Realm Currency that you collect will be stored in the Jar of Riches.

The Jar of Riches has a maximum storage limit. Don't forget to take out some Realm Currency from time to time~

​


◆ Realm Depot

Talk to the teapot spirit and open the Realm Depot.

In the Realm Depot, you can use Realm Currency to exchange for rare realm items, furnishings, and furnishing blueprints. As your Trust Rank increases, you can exchange for even more Realm Treasures.

​


◆ Adeptal Energy

As you place various furnishings, the Adeptal Energy in the realm will gradually increase. After you increase the Adeptal Energy Rank and Trust Rank, you will be able to collect Realm Currency faster and store more in the Jar of Riches.

​


We will bring everyone more information about the Serenitea Pot system at a later date. Until next time, Travelers!

subject: The Adventure Continues on PlayStation®5 on April 28 | Genshin Impact
content:
Travelers, the wait is over! Genshin Impact will be coming to the PlayStation®5 platform on April 28! Players all around the world can experience a smoother, more vivid adventure together!


Curious as to how miHoYo has brought the massive, detailed world of Teyvat to PlayStation®5? Want to know how the developers have improved the game's performance and the ingenuity behind those upgrades? Travelers, let's learn about the story of the development of Genshin Impact for PlayStation®5!

subject: New Character Demo - "Yanfei: Legal Expertise" | Genshin Impact
content:
Only by adhering to the law can the people solve life's myriad of problems.


This young lady, a half-illuminated beast, is the top legal expert in Liyue Harbor. She knows the law inside and out, as well as how to balance it with human nature.

subject: Do not seek to emulate the past, for there is no law that can suffice for all time.
content:
Do not seek to emulate the past, for there is no law that can suffice for all time.


"Law is the cornerstone of Liyue's prosperity. This cornerstone needs to be continuously polished to pursue perfection. I have had many dealings with Yanfei in legal affairs, and I must give her credit for helping me uncover quite a number of flaws in our system of laws." — Ningguang


Yanfei

Wise Innocence

Liyue Harbor's famed legal adviser

Vision: Pyro

Constellation: Bestia Iustitia


​


Yanfei is Liyue Harbor's top legal adviser. They say that she has memorized tens of thousands of legal codices and can skillfully apply the law in various situations. One can rest assured that she will aptly handle any legal case brought to her.


But this is not to say that Yanfei adheres blindly to the legal codices. Rather, she employs a degree of flexibility within the limits of the law and reason.


This half-illuminated beast protects the order of Liyue in her unique, effective manner.

All of Liyue's residents have heard of the famed Yanfei, no matter who you ask. Of course, as is the ancient rule in the City of Contracts, one seeking legal consultation or services from Yanfei must prepare a rather hefty sum as payment.


​

subject: A Good Day for Some Legal Practice: "Wise Innocence" Yanfei
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, let's get to know Liyue's top legal adviser — Yanfei!


She always gets the best deal for her clients that the law will allow. Many call her "the law that walks," but underneath, what she really longs for is a life of freedom and happiness.


​


​


​


​


​


​


​


​

subject: Genshin Impact for PlayStation®5 Is Almost Here - Available for Download in Two Days
content:
The PS5 version of Genshin Impact will arrive on the PlayStation™Store on April 28 at 6:00 AM (UTC+8). After that time, players can visit the Genshin Impact official site and click on HOME > "PS5 | PS4" to go to the Genshin Impact product page on the PlayStation™Store, where you can learn more about the game and download it. Or, go directly to the PlayStation™Store and search "Genshin Impact" to download the game.


Genshin Impact comes to PlayStation®5 on April 28 to bring Travelers more immersive visuals, a smoother combat experience, and faster loading times. Are you excited, Travelers? In two days, let's take our adventure through Teyvat next-gen!

subject: Event Wish "Gentry of Hermitage" - Boosted Drop Rate for Zhongli!
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

 

〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 1.5 update – 2021-05-18 17:59:00


〓Event Wish Details〓

● During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Vago Mundo" Zhongli (Geo) will recieve a huge drop-rate boost!

● In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Wise Innocence" Yanfei (Pyro), "Chivalric Blossom" Noelle (Geo), and "Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona (Cryo) will recieve a huge drop-rate boost!

● After this event wish ends, the 4-star character "Wise Innocence" Yanfei (Pyro) will be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation" in Version 1.6.

※ Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

 

※ The "Test Run" trial event will be open during this event wish. Travelers may use fixed lineups containing the selected trial characters to enter specific stages and test them out. Travelers that complete the challenges will receive the corresponding rewards!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: "Hangout Events: Series II" - Story Quest Overview
content:
Travelers who reach the required Adventure Rank and complete the prerequisite quests will be able to use Story Keys to unlock Hangout Events for Noelle and Diona.

The Hangout Events feature unlocks at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)

 

〓Quest Start Time〓

Permanently available after the Version 1.5 update

 

〓Series II Unlock Criteria〓

Hangout Event: Noelle - Act II:

Complete the Archon Quest "Chapter I: Act III - A New Star Approaches"

And achieve all endings in Noelle's Hangout Event "Act I: Chivalric Training"

 

Hangout Event: Diona - Act I:

Adventure Rank 26 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Prologue: Act III - Song of the Dragon and Freedom"


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

The Story Quest feature is unlocked at Adventure Rank 26. Story Keys are obtained by completing Daily Commissions (one Story Key is awarded for every eight commissions completed.)

subject: Version 1.5 Events Preview
content:
As new version approaches, so too do new events — are you ready, Travelers? Scroll down and view the image below for details on upcoming events~


All times below based on server time

subject: Genshin Impact EP - The Divine Stone Sees the World
content:
Dawn paints the Bishui a jade-like hue, as morning brews the dew anew.

Lustrous lights in the harbor burn, till the moon falls and day shall return.

A journey of unnumbered years, of nights and days, of bygone times now passed like shadows, of the infinite vicissitudes of life.

subject: Serenitea Pot System Top Tips (I)
content:
Issue #1 - Basics of the Serenitea Pot

Greetings, Travelers~ The version update has been completed, and here are some sizzling tips for the basics on using the Serenitea Pot~


〓How to Enter/Leave the Serenitea Pot〓

To enter the Serenitea Pot, you will need to first go to Inventory > Gadgets and select it to place it. After placing the Serenitea Pot, select Enter the Serenitea Pot and you will find yourself in the realm within. After entering the Serenitea Pot, the game will enter into Co-Op Mode. (Friends in the Serenitea Pot are unable to receive Domain Team Invites~)


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


To leave the Serenitea Pot, you can similarly place it from Inventory > Gadgets and interact with it to leave the Serenitea Pot.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


In addition, you can open the Map, switch to the Teyvat world map by clicking on the bottom-right corner, and click on any Teleport Waypoint or Statue of The Seven to leave the Serenitea Pot.

Upon leaving your friend's Serenitea Pot, you will return to Teyvat in your own world.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


After entering the Serenitea Pot, click on the furnishings icon in the top-right corner to start decorating your realm.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


〓How to Visit Friends' Serenitea Pots〓

Travelers can visit the Serenitea Pot of friends of any World Level. Simply select a friend's avatar to request to visit their Serenitea Pot. You must add the other player as a friend before you can visit their Serenitea Pot~


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


You can click to open the permissions settings of the Serenitea Pot on the map interface.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


If your friend has a furnishing that is in the process of being crafted, interacting with the teapot spirit in their Serenitea Pot will help to speed up the furnishing's crafting progress. This helps your friend reduce the creation time for furnishings by a certain amount. You can provide assistance to multiple friends each day, but the same person cannot be assisted twice.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Other than Guest Assistance, you may also use a Vial of Adeptal Speed to immediately obtain the furnishing currently being crafted. You can exchange for the Vial of Adeptal Speed at the Realm Depot.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


〓How to Collect Wood〓

A new crafting function has been added to the Serenitea Pot system. Wood is one of the most important materials for crafting furnishings. Travelers can cut down trees in Teyvat to obtain a certain quantity of wood. This wood will be added to the Inventory automatically without having to be picked up.


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


​



〓How to Swap Materials Needed for Dyes〓

Paimon was just about to create some dyes when Paimon realized the Sunsettias needed to make the red dyes had been all eaten up! On the way to go gather more, Paimon heard that materials needed for dyes could be swapped with another. It turns out that Sunsettias needed for red dyes could be swapped with carrots, which Paimon has a ton of! This discovery saves a lot of time spent on gathering materials, so Paimon just had to share this tip with Travelers~


​

This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


And that's all for this round of tips! Paimon will be back to share more useful knowledge about the Serenitea Pot with everyone tomorrow~

subject: Collected Miscellany - "Yanfei: Blaze of Legal Brilliance" | Genshin Impact
content:
Yanfei is a legal consultant considerate of both reason and humanity in her work.


This sincere young lady with the blood of an illuminated beast running through her veins lives a life of joy, but not in excess.

subject: Energy Amplifier Initiation
content:
During the event, Travelers can challenge Places of Interest, Domains, and the Twisted Realm to obtain Fractured Fruit Data. Use Fractured Fruit Data to exchange for "Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona (Cryo), Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character EXP Materials, Mora, and more rewards.

 

〓Event Duration〓

2021-04-30 10:00:00  -  2021-05-17 03:59:59


〓Event Shop Duration〓

2021-04-30 10:00:00  -  2021-05-24 03:59:59

 

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above

 

〓Places of Interest〓

During the event, Travelers can go to Places of Interest and defeat the opponents there to gather Irminsul Fruit Fragments and obtain Fractured Fruit Data.

● When each Act begins, there will be 3 new Places of Interest. Each Place of Interest includes 3 locations. Defeat the opponents there to obtain rewards and the Irminsul Fruit Fragment.

● Equip Irminsul Fruit Fragments onto the Energy Amplifier to gain bonuses in Domains and the Twisted Realm.

 

〓Domains〓

After you successfully challenge Domains during the event, you will obtain Fractured Fruit Data.

● When each Act begins, there will be 1 new Domain. Each Domain can only be completed once.

 

〓Twisted Realm〓

During the event, Travelers can challenge the Twisted Realm to attain scores. Reach a combined score of certain amounts to claim Fractured Fruit Data.

● During the event, complete each Act's Domain challenge to unlock a stage of the Twisted Realm. Starting on the 10th day of the event, completing all of the Domains in the three Acts will unlock an additional stage of the Twisted Realm.

● Before each challenge, you can choose the challenge difficulty and conditions. The score you receive for completing the challenge is based on the difficulty and conditions chosen. You will obtain Primogems as a reward each time you first clear a stage.

● During the event, Travelers can challenge the same challenge stage multiple times. Try to obtain the highest score that you can for each stage. Your total combined score is the sum of your high scores on all challenge stages. When your total combined score reaches a certain amount, you can claim the corresponding rewards.

※ After the event gameplay period ends, you will be unable to claim the combined score rewards for the Twisted Realm. Please make sure to claim the rewards in time.

 

〓Event Details〓

● Fractured Fruit Data can be exchanged at the Event Shop for rewards.

● Exchange 1,000 Fractured Fruit Data for "Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona (Cryo). Can only be exchanged for once.


(Above times are all displayed according to your server time.)

subject: Serenitea Pot System Top Tips (II)
content:
Trust Rank

Trust Rank is an important component of the Serenitea Pot system, and Paimon is sure that all you Travelers would like to obtain the rich rewards from the Trust Rank quickly! In this issue, Paimon will introduce some tips about the Trust Rank~


〓How to Increase Trust Rank〓

The first time you craft and obtain a furnishing, you will earn Trust (you can only earn Trust when you craft the furnishing for the first time~). Accumulate Trust to increase your Trust Rank.

You need to obtain more Blueprints and craft furnishings if you want to increase your Trust Rank!


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


〓What Are the Trust Rank Rewards〓

After an increase in Trust Rank, Travelers can obtain rewards such as Furnishing Blueprints and Primogems. In addition, some new functions will also be unlocked.

Increase number of available Realm Layouts


Increase max. Realm Currency stored


Unlock exterior areas


Increase max. creation queue


Increase the types of goods brought by the Teapot Traveling Salesman


Teapot Spirit Transformation


Tubby the teapot spirit serves as the butler of all realm layouts. You do not need to re-accumulate Trust in the new realm unlocked.

After unlocking the realm layouts and exterior areas, you will have brand-new spaces to place your furnishings.

If you have unlocked multiple realm layouts, your friends will enter the realm layout currently in use when they visit your Serenitea Pot. You cannot switch the realm layout while you have guests in your Serenitea Pot.

With that, Paimon will continue to bring everyone more information about the Serenitea Pot tomorrow. See you all then~

subject: "Energy Amplifier Initiation" Gameplay Details
content:
The "Energy Amplifier Initiation" event is about to begin!


Researcher Hosseini of Sumeru has asked you to help collect the precious research material Irminsul Fruit Fragments, to which end he has entrusted a mysterious ancient relic to you for a time: the Energy Amplifier. Help Hosseini to gather Irminsul Fruit Fragments and unleash their power with the Energy Amplifier.

​


Additionally, new missions have also been added to Realm of Diversion. Complete them to receive BEP.

​



〓Event Duration〓

Gameplay Duration: 2021/04/30 10:00 – 2021/05/17 03:59 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: 2021/04/30 10:00 – 2021/05/24 03:59 (Server Time)


〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 20 or above


〓Event Description〓

During the event, Fractured Fruit Data can be obtained by challenging Places of Interest, Domains, and the Twisted Realm. Fractured Fruit Data can be used to exchange for supplies in the event shop.

​

Next, let's look in more detail at the specific content in the event~


Explore Places of Interest

Your goal is to head to different Places of Interest and retrieve Irminsul Fruit Fragments.

​



​


At Places of Interest are strange objects called Mutation Stones, which buff monsters nearby. It is probably a good idea to destroy these Mutation Stones before taking on the monsters.

​


There are three types of Irminsul Fruit Fragments that can be retrieved from Places of Interest:

​


Now, what can these different fragments do? First, we must understand a special device known as the Energy Amplifier.


Configure the Energy Amplifier

The Energy Amplifier is a device that can activate the Irminsul Fruit Fragments. Equip Irminsul Fruit Fragments onto the device to provide characters in your party with corresponding buffs (this effect is only active in Domains and the Twisted Realm).

Energy Amplifier Configuration Screen:

​

Tip: When entering the event Domain while in a Co-Op team, the Energy Amplifier will automatically be switched to the Co-Op Configuration of the host (1P in the party). Please set up your Irminsul Fruit Fragment Co-Op Configuration beforehand.

Motive Force is consumed when equipping Irminsul Fruit Fragments. Use more Motive Force to equip more and higher quality Irminsul Fruit Fragments.

​

Your initial Motive Force is relative to the total levels of all your characters. The higher level your characters are, the more Motive Force you have.

When you run out of Motive Force, you may seek assistance from up to three of your friend's characters to help gain more Motive Force (you may not request assistance when your available Motive Force is full).

​



Challenge Domains

During the event, a new Domain will be active when a new act becomes available. When you complete the Domain challenges, you will obtain Fractured Fruit Data and unlock the corresponding Twisted Realm stages. You may only complete each Domain once.

​



Challenge the Twisted Realm

During the event, points can be acquired by challenging the Twisted Realm. Complete corresponding Domain challenges to unlock the Twisted Realm.

​


Before the challenge begins, you can select the difficulty level and challenge conditions. Upon completion, you will receive points according to the selected difficulty and conditions. You will also receive Primogems the first time you complete each Twisted Realm stage.

​


During the event, you can challenge each stage as many times as you wish to get the highest score that you can. Your total combined score is the sum of your high score on each stage challenge. Attain a combined score of certain amounts and you will be able to claim Fractured Fruit Data and the event-exclusive namecard "Celebration: Fruit of Wisdom."

​

*Once the event ends, unclaimed Twisted Realm rewards will no longer be available. Please make sure to claim your rewards in time.

Tip: It is strongly recommended that Travelers team up with friends for these challenges!


〓Event Rewards〓

Fractured Fruit Data can be used to exchange for Primogems, Crown of Insight, Character EXP Materials, Mora, and other rewards. You can also use 1,000 Fractured Fruit Data to invite "Kätzlein Cocktail" Diona (Cryo) to your party (can only exchange for once).

​


Well, that's it for now! Stay tuned for more in the upcoming Top Tips issue on the "Energy Amplifier Initiation" event. See you soon!

subject: Developers Discussion – 4/29
content:
Hi, everyone! Here's the latest Developers Discussion~（*＾-＾*） What new optimizations might there be this time around? Quick, let's check it out!Before we look at the latest Developers Discussion, Paimon has an important message to share with everyone: "Travelers, please be aware that the official Genshin Impact team will never post any game-related information or version previews via personal accounts on social media platforms. Please refer to our official, verified social media accounts for official information and news. Do not believe or disseminate any unverified or unofficial information." If you want to learn the details of the Developers Discussion, look nowhere else but to our official Genshin Impact communities~


Q: The previous Treasure-Seeking Seelie event is over. Will we have another opportunity to obtain the gadget in the future?

A: Paimon's heard that there will indeed be further opportunities to obtain the Treasure Seeking Seelie in future versions. When the time arises, make sure you don't miss out~


Q: Will Keqing appear more in future quests?

A: In the future Moonchase Festival, there will be more interesting stories for Travelers to experience with Keqing... Stay tuned~


Q: Can I obtain Raw Meat from small animals while in Realms (in the Serenitea Pot)?

A: Travelers can only obtain meat from animals in Teyvat's open world, not in Realms. Come on, give the small animals in your Realm a sanctuary to rest, okay?


Q: Some effects generated by the triggering of certain Elemental Reactions (such as the Elemental Resonance effect "High Voltage," and the 4-piece set effects of the artifact sets "Viridescent Venerer" and "Thundering Fury") cannot take effect when the Elemental Reaction is triggered very far away from the character.

A: The appearance of this issue is due to the game design implemented during development prior to release: in order to avoid placing excessive requirements on system performance as well as maintain a consistent experience across platforms, we placed a distance restriction on the effect activation of Elemental Reactions. This restriction does not usually affect the normal combat experience in the game, but can be noticed when Travelers attempt to trigger this type of effect on targets extremely far away, as the effect will not be triggered as normal.

At the same time, the developers have been continuing to pay close attention to how Travelers utilize various Elemental Reactions in combat. In order to increase the role that Elemental Reactions play in combat, we plan to make the following adjustments in future versions:

1. When a character reaches Level 60 or above, the damage caused by major reactions (i.e. Electro-Charged, Superconduct, Overloaded, Swirl, and Shatter) will be increased.

2. The Base Shield DMG Absorption for  shields generated by Crystallize reactions will be increased.

3. The DMG Bonus provided by Elemental Mastery for major reactions will be increased. (Refer to the attributes panel in-game for the exact DMG Bonus amount)

The initial design of these adjustments is already being tested in the 1.6 Beta. The developers are continuing to monitor the data and performance of these adjustments. Before any related changes are officially implemented into the live version of the game, we will update Travelers regarding the final design for these adjustments.

subject: Story Teaser: Through the Eyes of a Dragon | Genshin Impact
content:
"Thus was a dragon forged from a sovereign's duty and a friend's loyalty. Thus did a ray of light illuminate the dragon's eyes, freeing the transcendent being to explore the world."

—Excerpt from "Contemporary Folk Tales of Liyue: Through the Eyes of a Dragon"


Between drama and history, fact fades into fiction, yet the truth remains.


Between mountains and mankind, the transient is subsumed, the everlasting endures.


Between friends, a thousand ages ago is but yesterday.

subject: Serenitea Pot System Top Tips (III)
content:
Teapot Traveling Salesman

Paimon heard that a new teapot spirit with precious wares and rare treasures will visit Travelers' realms on Friday, so here's an introduction for all you Travelers~


〓Teapot Traveling Salesman Visit Time〓

From 4:00 AM every Friday to 4:00 AM on the Monday of the next week, the Teapot Traveling Salesman will visit your realm, bringing precious wares and rare treasures.

Be swift to make deals with him, though. From 4:00 AM every Saturday to 4:00 AM on the Monday of the next week, you can also enter friends' realms to exchange with Teapot Traveling Salesmen within them for desired items.


〓What's Available at the Traveling Depot〓

The Teapot Traveling Salesman will bring some novel furnishings every week, and the Furnishing Blueprints they bring to each Traveler will be different. Travelers and friends share the number of times they can redeem furnishings at the Travel Depot, so don't forget to redeem furnishings that catch your eye~


This page is still in development and not indicative of final quality.


Paimon will have more info to bring to you in the future, so see ya next time~

subject: Energy Amplifier Top Tips - "Domain of Deceit"
content:
Hi Travelers~

The "Energy Amplifier Initiation" event has begun! Complete all challenges in the domain "Vishap's Rest" to unlock challenges in the "Domain of Deceit" of the "Twisted Realm." Oh yes, you can challenge the "Twisted Realm" in Co-Op Mode, so give the challenge a try with some friends~

Right, let's get back to the topic! In this issue of tips, Paimon will introduce you to the contents of the Domain of Deceit. Let's go take a look~



● Ley Line Disorder

Defeated opponents will drop unstable High-Energy Crystal Cores.

These Crystal Cores will explode when characters get close to them, dealing Geo DMG to nearby characters.


● Strategies

The Crystal Cores will deal immense DMG when they explode, so Paimon advises you to stay away from them after defeating opponents. The Crystal Cores will explode on their own and disappear after a while.

As Geovishaps and Geovishap Hatchlings are incredibly agile, Paimon recommends that you use the Frozen reaction to limit their movements or use shields to temporarily paralyze them.
